commentList.translatedContent: It's really good. I've been to Hanting twice. The room is very clean and the bathroom is very good. It's really convenient for the machine to be delivered to the door of the room. The traffic is also very convenient. distance

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and comments. We will make persistent efforts to provide you with high-quality services wholeheartedly. Our small courtyard can park and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. , the hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel lobby gives people a very comfortable feeling as soon as you enter the door. It is the best lobby in so many Hanting hotels I have stayed in. The service from the little sister at the front desk is very good. The hotel breakfast is very rich and delicious, and the room is also very clean. It is far away from Chaoyang, Beijing. The station is very close. If I didn't know there is such a good Hanting when I went home this time, I would live in this Hanting in the future.

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear Guest: Hello! Thank you very much for your support and recognition of the hotel. Everything we do is to bring a different holiday experience to every guest. commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast is delicious, the room is clean and tidy, and the attitude of the service staff is very good. It is very close to Beijing Chaoyang Station. It takes only ten minutes to walk there. The lobby is very clean and bright. I will stay in this hotel again next time.

feedbackList.translateContent: Thank you very much for choosing Hanting among many hotels. Thank you for your support and recognition of the hotel. The hotel now has a new breakfast feature, and the robot can also deliver food to the room. The hotel has a free laundry room. I look forward to your next stay.

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is very close to the newly opened Beijing Chaoyang Station. The starting price is just a taxi ride away. During the epidemic, the hotel was disinfected very well. There is an automatic temperature measurement when entering the door. There is still a big TV in the room. It is very safe and secure to live in. Will stay here again in the future continue to choose this hotel

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving a good review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new, clean and hygienic. It is very close to Chaoyang Joy City. It is very convenient to shop and eat in it. The newly opened Chaoyang Railway Station is only 800 meters away. The hotel also has a free parking lot and a laundry room, which is very convenient. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your coming again!

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your recognition of the hotel. The hotel is very close to the newly opened Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station. It only takes 8 minutes to walk there. The traffic at the door is also very convenient. There are many places to go out to eat food. The hotel is Hanting Version 2.7 is a new product of Hanting, the breakfast is very rich, and there is a free self-service laundry room. I look forward to your next stay.

commentList.translatedContent: The environment of the hotel is good, the room space is also big, the lady at the front desk also provided drinks and robot baby food delivery, the breakfast is rich and the buffet can also be packed, the lobby is very bright and gives people a very warm feeling, very suitable for business trips, the surrounding area is three miles away There are many places to eat near Tun. I will come again next time

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving a good review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new, clean and hygienic. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City, where you can shop and eat, which is very convenient. Breakfast For the center buffet, the style is rich and delicious, and there is a free parking lot and laundry room. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your coming again!

commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast at the hotel is very rich and healthy, with vegetables and fruits, soy milk, porridge, fried rice, toast, suitable for all kinds of needs. It's very convenient to eat around. As soon as you go out, there is a big Yali restaurant, and there is a Japanese restaurant around the corner, Wan Fengting. The price is moderate, and the dishes are rich and delicious. A little further away is a KFC and a Pizza Hut, both within walking distance. The hotel is not facing the street, very quiet, suitable for college students to rest here.

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your support and affirmation of our work. Our hotel has a buffet Chinese and Western buffet breakfast from 7:00 to 10:00, which is very rich and delicious. There are also self-cooked small chaos and various Beijing snacks. The laundry room and parking lot are only 800 meters away from Chaoyang Railway Station, which is very convenient. The hotel warmly looks forward to the visit of distinguished guests again!
